text: Ndipo patsiku limene adzawasonkhanitsa onse, ndi kuti: “oh inu gulu la majini! Inu mudali kusokeletsa anthu mu unyinji wawo.” Ndipo anzawo ochokera m’gulu la anthu adzati: “Ambuye ife tidapindula kuchokera kwa wina ndi mnzake, koma tsopano tafika pa mapeto ya nthawi yathu imene mudatikhazikitsira ife.” Mulungu adzati: “Kumoto ndiko kumalo kwanu ndipo kumeneko mukakhala mpaka kalekale kufikira pamene Mulungu adzafuna.” Ndithudi Ambuye wako ndi Wanzeru ndi Wozindikira
